annotations: Hexagon Company 1 May 2015 1 October 2015 Account Executive Preparing quotations for clients Lenovo HTC Huawei Account management Negotiating price with suppliers to get a better deal Coordinating with other members to prepare events Amway expo 2015 Supervising the production process of suppliers Key learning from working experience and studying Ability to work under pressure and meet deadline Perseverance Cultural understanding Confidence Self motivation
